programme.title: Hugh Dan

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Alba Today
programme.desc: Sealladh ùr bho Alba. A new view from Scotland.

programme.title: Sionnach agus Maigheach (Fox & Hare)
programme.desc: 6/26. Fox wants to give Hare the best birthday ever. Owl and Tusk are invited, but only if they bring a nice present.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: 1/26. Tha Hari gu bhith trang sna boglaichean fliuch 's e lorg luachair. Hari is sent to the boggy marshes in search of some rushes.

programme.title: AH-AH/No-No
programme.desc: 3/52. Tha AH-AH ag iaraidh taic bho charaidean le bhith a' lorg inneal-ciùil dha. AH-AH is asking for help from his friends so that he can find a musical instrument to play.

programme.title: Cleasan Ataidh & Tilidh/The...
programme.desc: ...Adventures of Abney & Teal. 52/52. Abney is trying to write poems. Teal just wants to make noise! Maybe they can find a way to do both together.

programme.title: Pompon Am Mathan Beag/Pompon Little Bear
programme.desc: 15/39. Ged a tha Pompon na ghaisgeach, tha eagal aige bho bhith faighinn ìnean air an gearradh. Although Pompon is heroic, he is afraid when it comes to having his nails cut.

programme.title: Stòiridh
programme.desc: 54/80. Muireann Kelly a' leughadh Twinkles, Artair agus Puss. Muireann Kelly reads Twinkles, Artair agus Puss.

programme.title: An Doimhne/The Deep
programme.desc: 6/13. Tha Fionn a' feuchainn ri athair a stad is tha e feumach air taic bho Na Neachdan. Fionn is trying to stop his father and needs help from the Neachdan family.

programme.title: Dubhlain CBBC ALBA
programme.desc: 4/6. Calum Macdonald takes a look at some of the bonkers challenges attempted by the CBBC ALBA team, including some very smelly cheese tasting!

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 35/52. It is the Spuds' turn to run Grim Fest, the annual festival at Grimsby Heights.

programme.title: An Saoghal Droil aig Pol...
programme.desc: ...Ploc/The Rubbish World of Dave Spud. 36/52. Dave is tired of following his mum and dad's rules and creates a reverse fountain of youth in the bathtub.

programme.title: Dubhlain DIY (Instructions Not Included)
programme.desc: 2/5. Derek Murray hosts a fun knockout amateur DIY competition where couples go head to head. Derek Moireach le farpais spòrsail DIY is cupail a' strì an aghaidh a chèile.

programme.title: SpeakGaelic
programme.desc: 18/26. Journalist Charles Quinnell chats to Joy in the studio. Calum Maclean is in Argyll trying his hand at bookbinding in Iona.

programme.title: An Là
programme.desc: Naidheachdan ionadail, nàiseanta is eadar-nàiseanta gach là cuide ri fiosrachadh coimhearsnachd bho BBC ALBA. Local, national and international news and information from BBC ALBA.

programme.title: Miann na Maighdinn-mara (Mermaid Tales)
programme.desc: 4/4. Kate makes her way to Berneray and meets locals such as Donald MacLean, who explains what life was like there in days gone by.

programme.title: Coin Trusaidh/Muster Dogs
programme.desc: 4/5. At ten months the dogs have hit puberty, and are starting to show some new teenage rebelliousness.

programme.title: Celtic Connections
programme.desc: 10/11. An ceòl-triùir Lau a' cluich am port aca fhèin - Far from Portland. Musical folk trio Lau perform one of their own tunes - Far from Portland.

programme.title: Dàna | Scotland's Wild Side
programme.desc: 4/4. Coinneach MacFhraing seeks out unclimbed lines and challenging new routes on the remote and beautiful island of Rona.

programme.title: Sar-Sgeoil: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: Cathy MacDonald celebrates Muriel Spark's classic, The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie. Cathy NicDhòmhnaill a' moladh sàr-sgeul 'The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie' le Muriel Spark.

programme.title: Seòid a' Chidsin - The Kitchen Coves
programme.desc: 2/6. Tha na seòid a' còcaireachd le iasg is maorach. The lads are inspired by local seafood.

programme.title: Napoleon's Last Battle - Timewatch
programme.desc: Documentary drama exploring the last days of Napoleon's life in exile on St Helena, where he fought his final battle with words, presenting himself as the rescuer of France.

programme.title: Art on the BBC: Van Gogh - Life and Art
programme.desc: 2/4. Art historian Kate Bryan explores the BBC archives to create a television history of a man who has become the embodiment of the 'tortured artist', Vincent van Gogh.

programme.title: Timothy Spall: Back at Sea
programme.desc: 2/4. Timothy and Shane encounter problems with buoys when trying to dock at Liverpool, but Piel Island near Barrow-in-Furness finds them in the company of royalty.

programme.title: Atomic People
programme.desc: A film that explores the human cost of atomic bombs used in wartime. Contains scenes which some viewers may find disturbing.

programme.title: Napoleon's Last Battle - Timewatch
programme.desc: Documentary drama exploring the last days of Napoleon's life in exile on St Helena, where he fought his final battle with words, presenting himself as the rescuer of France.

programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: (2012) Sci-fi comedy sequel with Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones and Josh Brolin. Agent J travels to the 1960s to save his friend from being killed by a monstrous alien.

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly comic sci-fi action thriller with Michelle Yeoh. A laundromat owner's drab existence becomes much more exciting when she must traverse the multiverse to defeat an evil force.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: (2017) Festive zombie horror high school musical comedy. Anna and her friends slash and sing their way through undead hordes to reach their loved ones. But will they make it in time?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: (2019) Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jennifer Garner, Mila Kunis, John Oliver and Matthew Broderick. A girl's imaginary theme park comes to life when her mum goes to hospital.

programme.title: Ron's Gone Wrong
programme.desc: (2021) Animated comedy with Zach Galifianakis, Olivia Colman and Rob Delaney. Barney just wants a smart robot friend like everyone else at school. But will a faulty unit do the trick?

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy-drama with Liam Neeson. An estranged father and son team up to fix up and sell an old Tuscan villa that their late wife and mother left to them.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: (2022) Daisy Edgar-Jones stars in director Olivia Newman's adaptation of Delia Owens' best-selling novel about a feral child who's accused of murder in America's Deep South. Did she do it?

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: (2015) Drama with Charlotte Rampling and Tom Courtenay. The past unexpectedly intrudes on the lives of a couple preparing to celebrate their 45th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Happy as Lazzaro
programme.desc: (2018) Award-winning drama about Lazzaro, one of a group of Italian peasants who labour on a tobacco plantation owned by an aristocrat who constantly exploits her workers. In Italian/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out...
programme.desc: ...of Water: (2015) Surreal animated adventure. When the recipe for Mr Krabs' Krabby Patties vanishes, Bikini Bottom is plunged into anarchy. So SpongeBob sets out to put things right.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: (1950) Western with Randolph Scott and Dorothy Malone. A cunning US Marshal pretends to be a doofus to get a bank robber to take him to the hidden loot.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: (1961) World War II comedy starring Jack Lemmon. A luckless naval lieutenant is duped into commanding a dangerous mission into enemy territory during the Battle of the Bismarck Sea.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: (2019) Visually stunning sci-fi starring Brad Pitt as a famously cool astronaut sent to the edges of the solar system to save Earth from deadly power surges. With Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: (2014) Jude Law stars in Kevin Macdonald's undersea heist. A gang of British and Russian salvage experts aim to illegally snatch gold from a sunken WWII submarine.

programme.title: The Night House
programme.desc: (2020) Supernatural horror with Rebecca Hall. A woman starts to think her dead husband is haunting her as she wrestles with her grief in the isolated lakeside house he built for them.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dunston Checks In
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy starring Faye Dunaway and Rupert Everett. A hotel owner's attempt to upgrade her star rating is undermined by the arrival of a master thief and his light-fingered orangutan.

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: (2019) Family adventure with Isabela Moner, Eva Longoria and Michael Peña. Everyone's favourite young explorer must track down her parents, who are missing in Peru.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: (1956) Comedy with Katharine Hepburn and Bob Hope. A Russian captain defects to London, falls for the charms of Major Lockwood, and tries to convince him of the beauty of communism.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: (1984) Kung fu thriller with Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita. Elderly handyman Mr Miyagi teaches new-kid-at-school Daniel how to stand up to the school bully. It all hinges on the crane kick.

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: (2006) Family action-thriller with Alex Pettyfer and Mickey Rourke. British intelligence recruit a schoolboy to take on the man who killed his dad and is planning to unleash a deadly virus.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Apocalypse Now
programme.desc: (1979) Final cut of Coppola's award-laden take on the Vietnam War, with Martin Sheen and Marlon Brando. An assassin travels upriver to terminate a renegade colonel with extreme prejudice.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: (2012) Sci-fi comedy sequel with Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones and Josh Brolin. Agent J travels to the 1960s to save his friend from being killed by a monstrous alien.

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly comic sci-fi action thriller with Michelle Yeoh. A laundromat owner's drab existence becomes much more exciting when she must traverse the multiverse to defeat an evil force.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: (2017) Festive zombie horror high school musical comedy. Anna and her friends slash and sing their way through undead hordes to reach their loved ones. But will they make it in time?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: (2019) Animated adventure featuring the voices of Jennifer Garner, Mila Kunis, John Oliver and Matthew Broderick. A girl's imaginary theme park comes to life when her mum goes to hospital.

programme.title: Ron's Gone Wrong
programme.desc: (2021) Animated comedy with Zach Galifianakis, Olivia Colman and Rob Delaney. Barney just wants a smart robot friend like everyone else at school. But will a faulty unit do the trick?

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: (1948) Western. When a sadistic Union colonel (Glenn Ford) becomes a federal judge after the Civil War, his friend (William Holden) takes the deputy job to try and temper his actions.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: (1953) Audrey Hepburn won her only Oscar in this romance as a bored princess who runs away from her duties and meets an American journalist (Gregory Peck), who shows her Rome.

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy-drama with Liam Neeson. An estranged father and son team up to fix up and sell an old Tuscan villa that their late wife and mother left to them.

programme.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: (2022) Daisy Edgar-Jones stars in director Olivia Newman's adaptation of Delia Owens' best-selling novel about a feral child who's accused of murder in America's Deep South. Did she do it?

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: (2015) Drama with Charlotte Rampling and Tom Courtenay. The past unexpectedly intrudes on the lives of a couple preparing to celebrate their 45th wedding anniversary.

programme.title: Happy as Lazzaro
programme.desc: (2018) Award-winning drama about Lazzaro, one of a group of Italian peasants who labour on a tobacco plantation owned by an aristocrat who constantly exploits her workers. In Italian/subs.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out...
programme.desc: ...of Water: (2015) Surreal animated adventure. When the recipe for Mr Krabs' Krabby Patties vanishes, Bikini Bottom is plunged into anarchy. So SpongeBob sets out to put things right.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: (1950) Western with Randolph Scott and Dorothy Malone. A cunning US Marshal pretends to be a doofus to get a bank robber to take him to the hidden loot.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: (1961) World War II comedy starring Jack Lemmon. A luckless naval lieutenant is duped into commanding a dangerous mission into enemy territory during the Battle of the Bismarck Sea.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: (2019) Visually stunning sci-fi starring Brad Pitt as a famously cool astronaut sent to the edges of the solar system to save Earth from deadly power surges. With Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: (2014) Jude Law stars in Kevin Macdonald's undersea heist. A gang of British and Russian salvage experts aim to illegally snatch gold from a sunken WWII submarine.

programme.title: The Night House
programme.desc: (2020) Supernatural horror with Rebecca Hall. A woman starts to think her dead husband is haunting her as she wrestles with her grief in the isolated lakeside house he built for them.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Vanessa and Scott investigate Martin Copeland as the suspects try to hunt him down. Katherine risks everything in a shocking interview.

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Ainsley's Taste of Malta
programme.desc: Heading to the north of Malta, Ainsley's adventure takes him to the Xemxija Heritage Trail where he does some foraging. He also visits an olive grove owned by 'the God Father' of Maltese Olive Oil, Sam Cremona, to find out how he revived the stock of indigenous olive trees and what makes the oil so special

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Morning magazine featuring a lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Early morning chat show presented by Lorraine Kelly, with celebrity interviews, entertainment news, cooking tips, fashion features and musical guests.

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: A mix of celebrity chat, lifestyle features, advice and competitions

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: More celebrity interviews and topical debate from a female perspective

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the game show with Alex Jones, Tyler West, and Ricky Wilson all trying to 'say what they see' for a chance to win big for charity.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Fighting it out today are fiercely competitive father and son team Martin and Jono from Chislehurst, have-a-go hairdresser Antonia and brother Costanzo from Gloucestershire, and married couple Sharon and Mike from Birmingham. Adil Ray hosts

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as David from London, Josephine from Brighton, Beckie from Sheffield and Shaun from Glasgow pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ray goes after Dylan, while Ross denies being involved with anyone since he and Steph broke up and Charity has a fall while on a walk through the woods with Mack

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Each year, the Midsomer village of Angel's Rise hosts an annual psychic fayre in the vast and gothic Eddon Hall. Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts all manner of mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the gathering, Barnaby must step into a world of self-proclaimed witches to find the killer. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon, with Tracy-Ann Oberman and Colin Salmon

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Ryan Reynolds and Denzel Washington. Junior agent Matt Weston runs the CIA's sleepy safe house in South Africa and is suddenly handed a hot assignment when a rogue agent decides to give himself up after years on the run. Little does Weston know how dangerous things are going to get...

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: A flashback to the past follows Reena as she enters Josephine's Mafia fantasy world. Meanwhile, upsetting news shakes the small town of Victoria in 1997 as rumours surface and Rebecca and Cam reconnect. Drama, starring Riley Keough and Lily Gladstone

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Ninja Warrior UK
programme.desc: Ben Shephard, Rochelle Humes and Chris Kamara present the second part of the semi-final, with the best competitors from four heats testing their strength, speed and courage in this obstacle-course challenge. Those who make it to the end of the adrenaline-fuelled mission face one final task - scaling the heights of a tower named Mount Midoriyama - as they battle it out for the title of Ninja Warrior UK

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ruby, Manpreet and Lewis gossip over lunch, Charity reveals to Vanessa that she has been bleeding, and Vinny opens up to Aaron about trying to kiss someone else

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: A stressful wedding day culminates in Bernie requiring an ambulance, Debbie flouts protocol to propose to Ronnie, and Abi lies to Kevin in order to spend time with Carl

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: A new group of guests have barely touched down before the games begin as host Stephen Mangan welcomes 11 new pairs to the hostelry with a Day Trip Challenge that kicks off on the airport runway. It's a race that involves taxis, boats and the Caribbean Sea. Pairs must retrieve keys to earn their place at the hotel, but who will get a room and who will be at risk of heading home with emotions already running high?

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Richard Madeley and Sunetra Sarker take part in the big-prize quiz, hoping to land a sizeable amount for their chosen charities. As always, they have lifelines Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend, 50-50 and Ask the Host available to them if they get stuck. Presented by Jeremy Clarkson

programme.title: ITV Evening News

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Mack is determined to cheer up Charity, but she blames herself, Vinny searches for answers, while Vanessa and Manpreet bond over the shared frustrations of their love lives

programme.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
programme.desc: The chef is on the road in his bespoke vintage food truck in Andalucia. Wine chemist Joaquin explains the patience needed to produce sherry vinegar in the famed sherry triangle, before putting Tom to the test alongside blender Ramon to see if he can produce a blend good enough to match their best vintage. Tom's journey then takes him to Cadiz, where avocados have become big business. There local producer Rafa shows him the work being done to help grow this thirsty plant

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: The guests tackle a fast and frantic Hotel Game, involving memory, teamwork, and a suitcase full of unexpected items - with the winners gaining a valuable advantage. Then the action moves to the seaside for a Day Trip Challenge. Pairs must collect puzzle pieces from the ocean, assemble a giant jigsaw, and crack a riddle to lock in their position

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz. After foiling a terrorist attack in Mexico City, James Bond picks up the trail of a secret organisation known as Spectre. He infiltrates one of their meetings in Rome, only to discover that his every move has been monitored by Spectre's mysterious leader, a man known as Franz Oberhauser.

programme.title: The Assembly
programme.desc: Actor Danny Dyer is quizzed by an audience of inquisitive individuals who are autistic, neurodivergent or learning disabled, who ask why he went to therapy and how it feels to be a sex symbol for mums. From class and kebabs to absent fathers and Brexit, no subject is out of bounds

programme.desc: Ruby, Manpreet and Lewis gossip over lunch, Charity reveals to Vanessa that she has been bleeding, and Vinny opens up to Aaron about trying to kiss someone else

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: A stressful wedding day culminates in Bernie requiring an ambulance, Debbie flouts protocol to propose to Ronnie, and Abi lies to Kevin in order to spend time with Carl

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: A new group of guests have barely touched down before the games begin as host Stephen Mangan welcomes 11 new pairs to the hostelry with a Day Trip Challenge that kicks off on the airport runway. It's a race that involves taxis, boats and the Caribbean Sea. Pairs must retrieve keys to earn their place at the hotel, but who will get a room and who will be at risk of heading home with emotions already running high?

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Richard Madeley and Sunetra Sarker take part in the big-prize quiz, hoping to land a sizeable amount for their chosen charities. As always, they have lifelines Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend, 50-50 and Ask the Host available to them if they get stuck. Presented by Jeremy Clarkson

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Looking for lingos are housemates Dave and Kimberley from Hull, married couple Adeleen and Joshua from Bedford, and sisters Chinelo and Chioma from London.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Debbie from Cheshire, Rakesh from Stevenage, Sean from Liverpool, Angela from Hampshire and thousands of pounds is the matter of one of the country's finest quiz brains. Bradley Walsh asks the questions, but do they have the answers?

programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Mack is determined to cheer up Charity, but she blames herself, Vinny searches for answers, while Vanessa and Manpreet bond over the shared frustrations of their love lives

programme.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
programme.desc: The chef is on the road in his bespoke vintage food truck in Andalucia. Wine chemist Joaquin explains the patience needed to produce sherry vinegar in the famed sherry triangle, before putting Tom to the test alongside blender Ramon to see if he can produce a blend good enough to match their best vintage. Tom's journey then takes him to Cadiz, where avocados have become big business. There local producer Rafa shows him the work being done to help grow this thirsty plant

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: The guests tackle a fast and frantic Hotel Game, involving memory, teamwork, and a suitcase full of unexpected items - with the winners gaining a valuable advantage. Then the action moves to the seaside for a Day Trip Challenge. Pairs must collect puzzle pieces from the ocean, assemble a giant jigsaw, and crack a riddle to lock in their position

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz. After foiling a terrorist attack in Mexico City, James Bond picks up the trail of a secret organisation known as Spectre. He infiltrates one of their meetings in Rome, only to discover that his every move has been monitored by Spectre's mysterious leader, a man known as Franz Oberhauser.

programme.desc: Vanessa and Scott investigate Martin Copeland as the suspects try to hunt him down. Katherine risks everything in a shocking interview.

programme.title: Ainsley's Taste of Malta
programme.desc: Heading to the north of Malta, Ainsley's adventure takes him to the Xemxija Heritage Trail where he does some foraging. He also visits an olive grove owned by 'the God Father' of Maltese Olive Oil, Sam Cremona, to find out how he revived the stock of indigenous olive trees and what makes the oil so special

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Fighting it out today are fiercely competitive father and son team Martin and Jono from Chislehurst, have-a-go hairdresser Antonia and brother Costanzo from Gloucestershire, and married couple Sharon and Mike from Birmingham. Adil Ray hosts

programme.title: Tipping Point

The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as David from London, Josephine from Brighton, Beckie from Sheffield and Shaun from Glasgow pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Ray goes after Dylan, while Ross denies being involved with anyone since he and Steph broke up and Charity has a fall while on a walk through the woods with Mack

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Each year, the Midsomer village of Angel's Rise hosts an annual psychic fayre in the vast and gothic Eddon Hall. Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts all manner of mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the gathering, Barnaby must step into a world of self-proclaimed witches to find the killer. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon, with Tracy-Ann Oberman and Colin Salmon

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Ryan Reynolds and Denzel Washington. Junior agent Matt Weston runs the CIA's sleepy safe house in South Africa and is suddenly handed a hot assignment when a rogue agent decides to give himself up after years on the run. Little does Weston know how dangerous things are going to get...

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: A flashback to the past follows Reena as she enters Josephine's Mafia fantasy world. Meanwhile, upsetting news shakes the small town of Victoria in 1997 as rumours surface and Rebecca and Cam reconnect. Drama, starring Riley Keough and Lily Gladstone

programme.title: Unwind with STV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Ninja Warrior UK
programme.desc: Ben Shephard, Rochelle Humes and Chris Kamara present the second part of the semi-final, with the best competitors from four heats testing their strength, speed and courage in this obstacle-course challenge. Those who make it to the end of the adrenaline-fuelled mission face one final task - scaling the heights of a tower named Mount Midoriyama - as they battle it out for the title of Ninja Warrior UK

programme.desc: The women put the world to rights once more, discussing everything from politics to parenting, and invite a celebrity guest to chat about what they are up to - or anything else that takes their fancy

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: STV News and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts the game show, with Axel Blake, Richard Madeley and Sian Welby all trying to say what they see as they guess well-known phrases for the chance to play for the £50,000 jackpot

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Looking for lingos are housemates Dave and Kimberley from Hull, married couple Adeleen and Joshua from Bedford, and sisters Chinelo and Chioma from London.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: All that stands between Debbie from Cheshire, Rakesh from Stevenage, Sean from Liverpool, Angela from Hampshire and thousands of pounds is the matter of one of the country's finest quiz brains. Bradley Walsh asks the questions, but do they have the answers?

programme.title: STV News at Six and Weather
programme.desc: Including regional weather forecast

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Mack is determined to cheer up Charity, but she blames herself, Vinny searches for answers, while Vanessa and Manpreet bond over the shared frustrations of their love lives

programme.title: Tom Kerridge Cooks Spain
programme.desc: The chef is on the road in his bespoke vintage food truck in Andalucia. Wine chemist Joaquin explains the patience needed to produce sherry vinegar in the famed sherry triangle, before putting Tom to the test alongside blender Ramon to see if he can produce a blend good enough to match their best vintage. Tom's journey then takes him to Cadiz, where avocados have become big business. There local producer Rafa shows him the work being done to help grow this thirsty plant

programme.title: The Fortune Hotel
programme.desc: The guests tackle a fast and frantic Hotel Game, involving memory, teamwork, and a suitcase full of unexpected items - with the winners gaining a valuable advantage. Then the action moves to the seaside for a Day Trip Challenge. Pairs must collect puzzle pieces from the ocean, assemble a giant jigsaw, and crack a riddle to lock in their position

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: Spy adventure starring Daniel Craig and Christoph Waltz. After foiling a terrorist attack in Mexico City, James Bond picks up the trail of a secret organisation known as Spectre. He infiltrates one of their meetings in Rome, only to discover that his every move has been monitored by Spectre's mysterious leader, a man known as Franz Oberhauser.
